overview: Rename the entry point function name from `main` to `boss` across the entire Singlish ecosystem, including documentation, examples, and transpiler logic.
goals: Replace `main` with `boss` as the reserved keyword for the entry function in Singlish
Maintain backward compatibility in generated Go code (mapping boss -> main)

stories.title: Update Documentation
stories.description: Update all markdown documentation to refer to `boss` instead of `main` as the entry point.
acceptanceCriteria: Ensure no confusing references to 'action main' remain

stories.title: Update Transpiler Logic
stories.description: Modify the transpiler to accept `boss` and transpile it to `main` in Go.
acceptanceCriteria: Verify codegen handles the mapping correctly
Ensure generated Go code uses `func main()` so it is executable

stories.title: Migrate Example Code
stories.description: Bulk update all Singlish example files to use `action boss()`.

stories.title: Validation
stories.description: Verify the refactor didn't break the build or execution.
